testimonials.title: Champions Speak
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from the professionals who trust their careers to JRZ Pro Black DLC
testimonials.testimonial1: These blades completely changed my game. The edge retention is incredible - I can play three games without sharpening. The DLC coating gives me confidence in every turn.
testimonials.testimonial2: As a goaltender, stability is everything. The 30° radius on these blades gives me the perfect balance for butterfly saves and quick recoveries. Best investment I've made.
testimonials.testimonial3: The precision is unmatched. Both blades in the pair are identical - you can feel the perfect balance immediately. My defensive game has never been stronger.

science.title: The Science of Excellence
science.subtitle: Dive deep into the molecular engineering that makes JRZ Pro Black DLC revolutionary
science.processDescription: Our proprietary 4-step process creates the ultimate skating surface
science.carbonFormationDesc: High-energy plasma creates diamond-like carbon structures at the molecular level
science.dlcCoatingDesc: Precise layering of carbon nanoparticles forms the ultra-hard coating
science.molecularBondingDesc: Advanced bonding techniques ensure permanent adhesion to the steel substrate
science.surfaceHardeningDesc: Final treatment achieves 2850 HV hardness - approaching diamond levels
science.ctaText: Experience the science of superior performance

hero.title: The Science of Performance
hero.subtitle: Diamond-Like Carbon coating changes the game

coating.title: DLC Nanoparticle Coating
coating.description: Our proprietary carbon nanoparticle coating delivers unmatched edge hardness and sharpness. The mirror finish creates superior glide while the coating prevents deburring during sharpening.

precision.title: Precision Manufacturing
precision.description: Each blade is crafted from verified stainless steel with profiling tolerance of ~0.001". This ensures perfect consistency between pairs for optimal balance and performance.

sections.introduction: Engineered with aerospace-grade Diamond-Like Carbon coating technology, each blade represents the pinnacle of metallurgical innovation.

multiLayer.title: Multi-Layer Technology
multiLayer.description: Proprietary bonding process ensures lifetime durability

ultimateEdge.title: The Ultimate Edge
ultimateEdge.description: When precision matters and performance is non-negotiable, JRZ Pro Black DLC delivers the competitive advantage that separates champions from the rest.

hero.title: Choose Your Style
hero.subtitle: Optimized for your position on ice

player.title: Player Blades
player.description: Engineered for agility and speed. The 10' radius provides the perfect balance between stability and maneuverability for forwards and defensemen.

goalie.title: Goalie Blades
goalie.description: Built for stability and lateral movement. The 30' radius maximizes ice contact for superior balance and push power.

guide.title: How to Measure
steps: Measure from toe to heel in millimeters

proTip.label: Pro tip:
proTip.text: When in doubt, always choose the larger size for better comfort and performance.

frequency.title: Sharpening Frequency
frequency.description: Thanks to the DLC coating, our blades require sharpening 50% less often than standard blades. Most players sharpen every 15-20 hours of ice time.

showcase.title: Professional Grade Blades
showcase.subtitle: Engineered for optimal performance and longevity

proTip.label: Pro Tip:
proTip.text: With DLC coating, you'll notice significantly reduced wear and no deburring during sharpening, making maintenance faster and easier.

list.review1: Incredible blades! DLC coating really holds the sharpening much longer. Gliding has become noticeably better.
list.review2: Best investment for my game. The 30' radius is perfect for butterfly saves. Edge quality is unmatched.
list.review3: The profiling accuracy is amazing. The pair is perfectly balanced. I recommend it to all serious players.
list.review4: The mirror finish is real! Glide improvement is noticeable from the first stride. Worth every ruble.
list.review5: I recommend it to all my students. Quality is top-notch, delivery is fast. Excellent product!
list.review6: Game changer! My edges hold through multiple games now. No more mid-game sharpening.

warranty.title: 1-Year Warranty
warranty.description: All JRZ Pro Black DLC blades come with a one-year warranty against manufacturing defects. This covers coating issues, structural integrity, and profile consistency.

returns.title: 30-Day Returns
returns.description: Not completely satisfied? Return unused blades within 30 days for a full refund. Blades must be in original condition with no mounting or sharpening marks.

shipping.title: Russia-wide Shipping
shipping.description: Free shipping throughout Russia. Standard delivery takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping available for an additional fee.

importantNotes.title: Important Notes
importantNotes.wearNotCovered: Normal wear and tear is not covered
importantNotes.proofRequired: Proof of purchase required for all claims
importantNotes.contactSupport: Contact our support team for assistance

product.description: Premium hockey skate blades with Diamond-Like Carbon coating for superior edge retention and glide performance.

overview.title: Legal Information

hero.title: Legal Information
hero.subtitle: Transparency and trust in every transaction

overview.description: At JRZ Pro Black DLC, we are committed to providing clear and comprehensive legal information to our customers. This section contains important documents and policies that govern our business relationship with you.

sections.title: Payment Terms
sections.description: Information about accepted payment methods, security, and refund policies

sections.title: Delivery Terms
sections.description: Details about shipping coverage, timeframes, and tracking options

sections.title: Privacy Policy
sections.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information

hero.title: Payment Terms & Conditions
hero.subtitle: Secure transactions for your peace of mind

methods.title: Accepted Payment Methods
methods.description: We accept a variety of secure payment options to ensure convenient transactions for our customers.

security.title: Payment Security
security.description: All transactions are processed through secure, PCI-compliant payment gateways. Your financial information is encrypted and never stored on our servers.

processing.title: Order Processing
processing.description: Orders are processed immediately upon payment confirmation. You will receive an email confirmation with your order details and tracking information.

refunds.title: Refunds & Cancellations
refunds.description: Refunds are processed according to our return policy. Cancellations must be made within 24 hours of placing the order. Processing times may vary depending on your payment method.

hero.title: Shipping & Delivery
hero.subtitle: Fast and reliable delivery across Russia

coverage.title: Delivery Coverage
coverage.description: We deliver throughout Russia via trusted courier services and postal operators.

shipping.title: Shipping Rates
shipping.description: Free shipping on all orders over 10,000₽. Standard shipping rates apply to orders below this amount. Express shipping available for urgent deliveries.

tracking.title: Order Tracking
tracking.description: All orders include tracking information. You can monitor your delivery status through our website or the courier's tracking system.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your data protection is our priority

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.description: We collect only the necessary information to process your orders and provide excellent customer service.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.description: Your information is used solely for order fulfillment, customer support, and improving our services. We never sell or share your personal data with third parties.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact our support team for any privacy-related requests.
